title: Multiple Disconnects
body: A couple buddies and I were in champion select when everyone in our lobby disconnected. We all had to exit the client and reconnect. While in the lobby, we all disconnected again. Was that just us or did anyone else get it?

replies.body: Were you all possibly on the same network when you were all dc'd? Pretty odd if not, but I'd be sure to try some general troubleshooting to see if this might have been a hiccup in your connection with the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
This also just happened to me, and me and my duo are in different parts of the city
